attributes.action: Make it law to wear cycle helmets for Adults and Children
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is widely accepted that cycle helments save lives. we need to make it law that every one wears a cycle helmet. Its very difficult to try and educate children to wear helments when they see their peers and adults not wearing them. Cost is negliable. Parents spend hundreds on bikes a few more pounds for a helmet is nothing.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
